message:
SYSTEM: OEG-Talk-MentalHeath-ShortVersion%281%29.pptx: Diapositiva {2}
  I am not a psychologist or have any qualifications in the field.

 The following talk is intended to give some descriptions of certain mental dark places common in scholars in Academia, especially in PhD and post-docs. 

 The ultimate goal of this is to promote discussion among group members to share their experiences and advice. 

 This is not a talk about how Academia should be, but a talk about how it can provide, along with some personality traits, the perfect scenario for these mental dark places to arise.  

 The "Overcoming" in the title of the talk does not mean my inner battle is over.
speaker: SYSTEM
